snippet: To ease the costs of online learning, Comcast is offering low-cost broadband service to children from Chicago’s poorest families.
lead_paragraph: To ease the costs of online learning, Comcast is offering low-cost broadband service to children from Chicago’s poorest families.

headline.main: Reducing the Cost of Logging In to Learn
headline.seo: Comcast Offers Low-Cost Internet Access to Poor Families
headline.print_headline: Reducing the Cost of Logging In to Learn
